LanguageData.DMS_BF_ExtendArmor.label: Extended Armor Plates
LanguageData.DMS_BF_ExtendArmor.description: An upgrade package of composite armor attachments that is suitable for Battle Frame chassis, which can effectively resist direct hits to the chassis from various threats such as fragments and medium-caliber gunfire.
LanguageData.DMS_BF_ExtendCargo.label: Extended Cargo Racks
LanguageData.DMS_BF_ExtendCargo.description: Side mounted cargo racks that are suitable for the Battle Frame chassis, which can effectively increase the carrying capacity of the Battle Frame and its variants.
LanguageData.DMS_BrokenCeramics.label: Broken ceramics
LanguageData.DMS_CeramicsPlating.label: Ceramic Plates
LanguageData.DMS_CeramicsPlating.description:
A set of ceramic plates can be mounted on the mech's external shell to provide additional protection, but once damaged it can only be replaced with a new one as it is ablative armor in function.
The maximum amount of the plating that can be applied on a mech depends on its body size.
LanguageData.DMS_NuclearBattery.label: Nuclear Battery
LanguageData.DMS_NuclearBattery.description: A nuclear fission battery with a simple structure, commonly found in many unmanned signal stations and defense robots, the device consists of six high-density uranium-235 columns near critical mass and thermocouples integrated and wrapped in a high-strength shell. Its stored energy is enough to make most models of automatroid operate for decades.
LanguageData.DMS_ReinforcedFrame.label: Reinforced Frame
LanguageData.DMS_ReinforcedFrame.description: A set of tungsteel frames to replace parts that are prone to wear and tear; can effectively improve the mech's durability during high-intensity combat and reduce the time spent on maintenance. But in exchange it will significantly increase the weight of the mech and affect its speed.
LanguageData.DMS_SyntheticTendon.label: Synthetic Tendons
LanguageData.DMS_SyntheticTendon.description: A bundle of biosynthetic muscles attached on the outer layer of mechanical limbs. These upgrades can effectively increase work output but will increase the automatroid's energy consumption.
LanguageData.DMS_TB_HeavyHydraulicFrame.label: Heavy Hydraulic Frame
LanguageData.DMS_TB_HeavyHydraulicFrame.description: Heavy add-on module in order to allow the capability to mount heavy weapons for the Iguana and Gecko mechs.
